definitions.definition: Calling attention ; flashy ; standing out to the eye.
Making a striking or aesthetically pleasing display.
Inclined to showing (by conveying an impression so that events are described in the narrative ), instead of telling (by explicitly stating facts ).
definitions.label_groups: informal , chiefly of a literary work

main_definition: ( sometimes derogatory ) Calling attention ; flashy ; standing out to the eye.
secondary_definitions: Making a striking or aesthetically pleasing display.
( informal , chiefly of a literary work ) Inclined to showing (by conveying an impression so that events are described in the narrative ), instead of telling (by explicitly stating facts ).
